channel.title: The noob guide
channel.description:
The noob guide: [Fancy title huh?]
Do you want to know if your a noob or not?
Just follow my guide and you will soon know.
You know your a noob when you kill a gaurd and shout, "I pked him!!!"
You know your a noob when your being attacked by a highwayman and say, "Plz stop attacking me"
You know your a noob when you get PKed by a noob.
You know your a noob when you play runescape 24/7 and your only lv 17.
You know your a noob when you give away a phat for a rune long.
You know your a noob when a noob calls ya a noob.
You know your a noob when you think having 10k is considered being "Rich"
You know your a noob when you think a black long is too much.
You know your a noob when u die and lose your chefs hat and quit
You know you a noob when you get scammed a black dagger and cry.
You know your a noob when u have 100k and say omfg im rich!!!
You know your a noob when you ask a high level to be your friend/bf/gf and then ask for 'fr33 m0n3y pl0x!" and stuff
You are a noob, when you kill a goblin and logg off happy thinking " I killed a goblin booyah "
You know your a noob when you pickup everything and sell it.
You know your a noob when you finish tut island and say "dis game iz stupit".
You know your a noob when you dont auto.
You know your a noob when you follow people for no reason
You know your a noob when you ask someone to use there bank
You know your a noob when you get 5 gp and go rub it in other peoples faces.
You know your a noob when you sell normal bones as zezimas bones.
You know your a noob if you have zezima on your friends list
You know your a noob if you have seen zezima
You know your a noob when you die from a goblin
You know your a noob when you below lvl 50
You know your a noob if you use a g maul (i cant stress that enough)
You know your a noob when your a pure, to scared to face people your own lvl
You know your a noob when you say your zezima
You're a noob if you have an existing name, or stole from someone else and added 123 behind it.
You no ur a nub wen u kent spel [You know your a noob when you cant spell]
You know your a noob when your a noob
You know your a noob when you dont know what "lol" means
You know your a noob when you ask for a bronze dagger
You know your a noob when you pay 50k for a "rare" brown dagger. [Bronze]
Your a noob when you don't realize the difference between noob and newb.
You know your a noob when u sell a rare thats a cheff hat
You know your a noob when u cry because u got scammed of your cheff hat
Wanna add?
Just tell me something and Ill add it.

item.title: The noob guide
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

you know your a noob if you think full black too much

you know your a noob if you want to be a girl on rs when your a dude

Read full topic

item.title: The noob guide
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

You know your a noob when you buy 10gp off the internet.
You know your a noob when you want a GF/BF in runescape.
You know your a noob when you offer a level 8 56gp for membership.
You know your a noob when you own a level 3 and say “OWNED MUCH??!?111!!11??”
You know your a noob when you run from a Thief that attacked you and say “GLITCH, PLAYER IS ATTKIN ME OUTSIDEE WILDY!!”
You know your a noob when you worship Zezima.

Thats all for now lolz

Read full topic

item.title: The noob guide
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

the fu superior:

Your a noob when you don’t realize the difference between noob and newb.

I actually do not believe there is any difference, and it is facetious and superficial to suggest otherwise.

Read full topic
